Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan team still have a hint of hope of reaching the knockout stage. First, they must beat South Africa on Thursday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan team still have a hint of hope of reaching the knockout stage.
Others: Fakhar Zaman sustained a posterior cruciate ligament (PCL) injury to his right knee.
Mohammad Haris was named as a replacement for Fakhar after he sustained a PCL injury.
